1.Title: In a Flash of Light
1.Description: Increases <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> by <color=#2BAD00>15%</color>. When the equipper hits an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Attack</color>, their Energy Generation Rate increases by <color=#2BAD00>18%</color> for 8s.
